# Copilot Instructions

This is an HTML-based GitHub project for Security+ study materials.

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main entry point
- `css/` - Stylesheets
- `js/` - JavaScript files
- `assets/` - Images and other media

## Guidelines
- Follow semantic HTML5 standards
- Keep CSS organized and modular
- Use vanilla JavaScript (no frameworks required)
- Maintain accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1)
- Document code with comments for clarity
